name: Raider's Digest
description: A soon-to-be website with various resources for Final Fantasy XIV players that want to explore Ultimate content. Collaborative effort with several teammates. Built using Nextjs.

name: Chou Bot
description: A discord bot with integrated with ChatGPT to provide a sarcastic chatbot companion. Also comes with commands and a levelling system within the discord. Currently serving 20 people. Currently not available to try. Hosted with AWS using a Docker container.
demoURLText: Add this bot to your server (currently disabled)

name: Zhongli Bot
description: A Zhongli role-playing bot for discord. Requires a #zhongli channel in your discord for message responses with quotes. Fairly simple but commissioned. Hosted with AWS using a Docker container. Try it out!
demoURLText: Add this bot to your server

name: Chew Plush Store
description: Your one stop shop for any plushies you want. No, you cannot actually purchase any. Manages checkout state between pages using React's built-in Context API.

name: Exchange Global
description: Exchange Global is a sleek, fast way to look up rates for almost any currency, including crypto. Recently added pagination, repaired the search function, and changed the API endpoint as the old one was deprecated.

name: Task Driver
description: Task driver is a compact to-do list that stays even when you leave the page. Recently added categories, a Redux store for state perpetuation, responsive UX with toasts, and slightly improved styling.
